fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Gain detection immunity for the night.
- (Rehearsing) Entrap a player in your instrument's horn, permanently reducing their defense value, then rehearse.
- (Concert) Attack a player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may also grant detection immunity to another player if you so wish.
- **Rehearse Radius:** 3
